extendedInfo.description: This FREE version of the most popular flight-tracking app turns your phone or tablet into an air traffic radar and lets you see airplane traffic around the world in real-time.  Download now to discover why millions of users already have installed Flightradar24 Free. Flightradar24 is, or has been the number one travel app in more than 50 countries including Germany, France, United Kingdom, Japan, and Australia. We are frequently featured in the media and recent media mentions include Bild (Germany), Le Monde (France), and CNN (US).Flightradar24 Free features include:* Planes moving in real-time* Airline and callsign information for individual planesDo you want more features? Buy Flightradar24 Pro and get:* Comprehensive information for each individual plane, including route, speed, altitude and more* Augmented reality view â identify the planes flying overhead by simply pointing your phoneâs camera to the sky* Easy to search for a specific flight* Filter by airline, altitude, speed and more* Emergency squawk sush notification alerts* Flight trails and callsigns directly on map* See airline logos in connection with the aircraft* Banner freeCOVERAGEWe are constantly working to expand Flightradar24âs global coverage. Below is a breakdown of our coverage as of August 2012. For the most up-to-date coverage, please visit http://www.flightradar24.com* EUROPERoughly 95% of the continent covered* NORTH AMERICAComplete coverage in the US and Canada (but with 5 minute delay) thanks to FAA data. Additional real-time data in large parts of the two countries. Minor coverage in Mexico* Rest of the WorldWe have coverage in parts of Russia, Australia, New Zealand, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, China, Colombia, Costa Rica, Greenland, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Kazakhstan, Malaysia, Maldives, Mauritius, Mexico, Middle East, Philippines, Singapore, South Africa, Taiwan, Thailand and many other countriesPlease note that coverage will vary.IMPORTANT INFORMATION Please note that Flightradar24 only can track aircraft equipped with an ADS-B transponder. The exception is in the US and Canada where we get radar data from the FAA and can track almost all planes, but with a five-minute delay. Visit http://www.flightradar24.com for more information about ADS-B and Flightradar24âs coverage.CONNECT WITH FLIGHTRADAR24Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/flightradar24 and follow us on Twitter http://www.twitter.com/flightradar24 for the latest on Flightradar24.HELP & SUPPORTPlease visit the Flightradar24 forum for help and support.http://forum.flightradar24.com/threads/89-Important-Read-this-before-you-ask-questionsDISCLAIMERThe use of the information presented in Flightradar24 is strictly limited to your personal enthusiast activities (i.e. for entertainment purposes), which specifically exclude any activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this application be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use and/or interpretation of the data in the application. We reserve the right to anonymously track and report a user's activity inside of app.

reviews.title: Bit confusing
reviews.comment: OK I got around the flight number problem, but I still can\'t see the arrivals board that I in app purchased
reviews.author: Hussein Alobaidi

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: cool, working fine, satellite mode is really nice...
reviews.author: Ahmed Aslam

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: This for all the people who say the plane is heading in the wrong direction.Planes sometimes do have to go off course, so the app is extremly accurate and great for free.
reviews.author: Reeve Taylor

reviews.title: Nagware with minimal features
reviews.comment: Constantly, the \"upgrade to pro version\" pops up with no button to close it. This app is just a map with airplane icons. No further information as on their website. Total desaster - better surf the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: It does what it says. However it could have some more features. And yes, I know it\'s just a sample to make me want to upgrade. And it succeeded.
reviews.author: Diogo Alves

reviews.title: Map has ADHD
reviews.comment: Try and pick a flight and the map randomly bounces to some other flight, all over the country. It makes the app useless.
reviews.author: Sean Squire

reviews.title: Paid for pro & it sucks!!!
reviews.comment: I get better track with the free version .. i iust paid for it and requested a refund .. I I didn\'t got my money back .. plus de 1.00 extra that the took ..wtf!!!
reviews.author: Felipe Cuecha

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: The app is good but in Pakistan it\'s service is bad I mean the airport details dont come up as well as the flights.. also only PIA is available even though there are other Pakistani airlines aswell  otherwise the app is great.. Please improve it for Pakistan   Thanks  :)
reviews.author: Salman Abid

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Ui is not up to date, app crashes on a galaxy s3 and an asus tf300, maps are really slooooooow to load (not using Google maps cache and accelerator ?) If you are connected in wifi, it\'s correct; if not, it is not usable... and, by the way, asking \"do you want to exit\" is sooo 2000s..  we are in 2013, get an update !
reviews.author: Antoine Fleury-Gobert

reviews.title: Use The Website
reviews.comment: App won\'t hold a position.  Tap a plane on the west coast and suddenly you\'re zipped to Kansas or the Great Lakes with the original flight info box opened on the wesr coast still open above a totally different aircraft in a different region.  Stick with the website.
reviews.author: Craig Cooper

reviews.title: Be very wary
reviews.comment: The flight I was tracking disappeared . Why cant these these apps do what they say they do.
reviews.author: Andrew Matthews

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother installing this app unless you just want to test out to see if it will work at all on your phone before you buy it - this version doesn\'t even let you search for a flight.
reviews.author: Zacc Cooley

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Really stoked about how accurate it is on the live updates. I forget witch color planes that are but within 5 minutes I was able to track a flight and find it in the sky over head. At one point two live planes were in a similar route and I track those two and was able to locate both of them at once. Really surprised at the accuracy and super happy with the child like joy its given me. This is fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Star
reviews.comment: As you can see i am driving my car and i see a plane flying above the air and i open this app it was real. Good job developers. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Free version is worthless
reviews.comment: Istalled free version on G Tab after using it on pc. Professional version I assume would be better. Cant track specific aircraft on free version which is what most people use it for. Just taking up memory space.
reviews.author: Richard Kenny

reviews.title: Awful compared to pc version
reviews.comment: Very minimal details on flight, no track of where the flight has been, background keeps losing chunks of map. Uninstalled and will use browser version on my pc.
reviews.author: Jerry Shelley

reviews.title: Utterly useless
reviews.comment: The free version of this App tells you NOTHING about the aircraft of interest, all you get is a map with a graphic of an airplane on it. If you want any info you have to upgrade to the paid version, which is unfair because the web version gives you all this for free. Removed this waste of space from my phone.
reviews.author: Paul Renhard

reviews.title: Bad location centering
reviews.comment: Trying to see detail on any fli right leads to recentering of map somewhere in canada.  Nice concept, but a useless app.
reviews.author: Randy Steck

reviews.title: Can u include
reviews.comment: I like dis apps & i recommend it to my friends but please include the mactan international airport in your map please
reviews.author: Bern Pepito

reviews.title: Nice program but not best for a smartphone
reviews.comment: Works very nice on a pc but unless u have a real high end smartphone with a good processor this pgm takes a lot of power to run and most phones will bog down and the program will lagg very bad and will freeze up a lot
reviews.author: Charles George
